thread.section_title: Cosmopolita Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very friendly, great location
thread.title_full: Very friendly, great location - Review of Cosmopolita Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Shira K
title: Very friendly, great location
text: The location is superb -- we managed to walk to all the piazzas in Rome without needing transportation. The hotel is small, the room is not big but comfortable, the bathroom is too small. The breakfast is reasonable. The hotel staff are very friendly and helpful.
